```{r}
PearsonLee<-read.csv("PearsonLeeSimple.csv")
  
```

# Regression Analysis to use the Parents height to predict the Child heights 


```{r}
Pearson_mod<-lm(PearsonLee$child~PearsonLee$parent)
summary(Pearson_mod)
```

# Plotting

```{r}
plot(child~parent,main="Pearson Lee",data=PearsonLee,xlab="Child (inches)",ylab="Parent (inches)")
abline(lm(child~parent,data=PearsonLee))

```
